NASHVILLE - The state wants to give its Donnelley J. Hill State Office Building on Civic Center Plaza Downtown to the city of Memphis in exchange for 400 parking spaces at Peabody Place .

The state is leaving the 12 - story Hill Building , which opened in 1968 at the corner of Poplar and North Main , and moving seven blocks south into newly leased space at One Commerce Square formerly occupied by Pinnacle Airlines .
